entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:09 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 58 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 47.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 47. Wind chill minus 57 in the evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
